subject: Use of Waste Plastic obtained through Dry Process outlined in IRC:SP:98-2013 in Hot Bituminous Mixes (Wearing Courses)
text: HRdv <4l TTTHTf qifedrut RhY Plione 91-11-25074100/25074200 (57 4Rdrt 31   {roTHTTf TATeT4) 477 Fax 91-11*25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 7-5 W 6 Tazr-10 , ERAT, # farit-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/ Policy Guidelines/Tech. & Misc_ / 2019 No. 18.36/2019 dated the September, 2019 [Decision taken on File No: NHAI/SHS/2019/01 of Highway Operations Division] Sub: Use of Waste Plastic obtained through Process outlined in IRC:SP:98-2013 in Hot Bituminous Mixes (Wearing Courses). In continuation of CGM(HO) NHAI, HQ letter dated 28.08.2019 to all ROs of NHAI (copy at Annex-1) containing instructions on collection and use of waste plastic in view of letter dated 27.08.2019 of MoRTH (copy at Annex-_ the attention of ROs is drawn to the following: (i) IRC vide IRC:SP:98-2013 issued  guidelines for use of waste plastic in hot bituminous mixes (Dry Process) in wearing courses. (ii) MoRTH issued directions for use of  plastic waste in bituminous mixes in construction of NHs vide Letter dated 09.11.2015 and 27.12.2016 (copies enclosed at Annex-384)_ MoRTH decided that bituminous mix with waste plastic should be the default mode for periodic renewal with hot mixes within 50 Km. periphery of urban area having population more than 5 lakh. MoRTH further directed that in each state/ UT, bituminous mixes with waste plastic may be used as per IRC:SP:98-2013 in atleast a stretch of 10 Km as project. (iii) MoRTH further decided vide letter dated 27.08.2019 that in 2019-20 that Swachhata Hi Seva Campaign (SHS) would focus on Plastic Waste Management as main theme and the instructions had already been issued vide letter dated 28.08.2019 of CGM(HO). 2 In compliance of the directions of MoRTH vide letter dated 27.08.2019, the following further instructions are issued to the Regional Officers in continuation of CGM(HO) , NHAI, HQ letter dated 28.08.2019 (T) ROs will facilitate use of waste plastic in Hot Bituminous Mixes by the Contractors/ Concessionaires in their regions; as per the directions of MoRTH cited above and in accordance with IRC:SP:98-2013. ROs shall   identify the cities and nearby NH stretches to incorporate use of waste plastic in hot bituminous mixes (dry process) in wearing courses in terms of IRC:SP:98-2013. Such NH stretches could be the stretches of periodical renewals or pilot stretches of wearing courses preferably of  service road to be identified specifically by ROs considering the waste plastic likely to be generated in the identified cities nearby: (ii) The list of agencies, institutes and transaction advisers empanelled by Ministry of Urban Development for providing   support to the cities/ towns for solid waste management are placed as Annex-5" In addition, list of PROs / Agencies empanelled by Central Pollution Control Board for Plastic Waste Management are also attached as Annex-6 " Some other identified private vendors, who are actively involved in plastic waste management in the country are as under: 5n77 NHAL 12t4 Dry 2), pilot
